definitions.definition: A food made from ground roasted cocoa beans.
definitions.example: Chocolate is a very popular treat.

definitions.definition: A drink made by dissolving this food in boiling milk or water.
A single, small piece of confectionery made from chocolate.
definitions.example: He bought her some chocolates as a gift. She ate one chocolate and threw the rest away.

definitions.definition: A dark, reddish-brown colour/color, like that of chocolate (also called chocolate brown).
definitions.example: As he cooked it the whole thing turned a rich, deep chocolate.

definitions.definition: (chiefly in the past participle) To add chocolate to; to cover (food) in chocolate.
To treat blood agar by heating in order to lyse the red blood cells in the medium.
Black (relating to any of various ethnic groups having dark pigmentation of the skin).
